clusterProperties.name: ollama_target
clusterProperties.description: The host name and port number for gateway to reach the ollama api

policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:JavaScript>
            <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:Name stringValue="parse_query"/>
            <L7p:Script stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[var ollamaqueryRaw = context.getVariable("request.mainpart");
var ollamaquery = JSON.parse(ollamaqueryRaw);
var model = ollamaquery.model;
context.setVariable("model", model);
var appid = ollamaquery.appid;
context.setVariable("appid", appid);
var llmquery = ollamaquery.messages[0].content;
context.setVariable("query", llmquery);]]></L7p:Script>
        </L7p:JavaScript>
        <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            <L7p:Detail stringValue="parsed app id: ${appid}"/>
        </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ThroughputQuota>
                <L7p:CounterName stringValue="aigw-${appid}"/>
                <L7p:Global booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Quota stringValue="7"/>
                <L7p:TimeUnit stringValue="hour"/>
            </L7p:ThroughputQuota>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="RVJST1IgLSBBZ2VudCAke2FwcGlkfSBoYXMgZXhjZWVkZWQgaXRzIEFJIHRva2Vucy4gUGxlYXNlIHRyeSBhZ2FpbiBsYXRlci4="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="quota exceeded"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:JavaScript>
            <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:Name stringValue="parse_query"/>
            <L7p:Script stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[var ollamaqueryRaw = context.getVariable("request.mainpart");
var ollamaquery = JSON.parse(ollamaqueryRaw);
var model = ollamaquery.model;
context.setVariable("model", model);
var appid = ollamaquery.appid;
context.setVariable("appid", appid);
var userid = ollamaquery.userid;
context.setVariable("userid", userid);
var llmquery = ollamaquery.messages[0].content;
context.setVariable("query", llmquery);]]></L7p:Script>
        </L7p:JavaScript>
        <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            <L7p:Detail stringValue="parsed user id: ${userid}"/>
        </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ThroughputQuota>
                <L7p:CounterName stringValue="aigw-user-${userid}"/>
                <L7p:Global booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Quota stringValue="5"/>
                <L7p:TimeUnit stringValue="hour"/>
            </L7p:ThroughputQuota>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="RVJST1IgLSBVc2VyICR7dXNlcmlkfSBoYXMgZXhjZWVkZWQgaXRzIEFJIHRva2VuIGVudGl0bGVtZW50cy4gUGxlYXNlIHRyeSBhZ2FpbiBsYXRlciBvciBjb250YWN0IHlvdXIgb3JnIGFkbWluIGZvciBtb3JlIGNyZWRpdHMu"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="user quota exceeded"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:JavaScript>
            <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:Name stringValue="force_llama2_model"/>
            <L7p:Script stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[var ollamaqueryRaw = context.getVariable("llm_req");
var ollamaquery = JSON.parse(ollamaqueryRaw);
ollamaquery.model = "acme_llm";
var newreq = JSON.stringify(ollamaquery);
context.setVariable("llm_req", newreq);]]></L7p:Script>
        </L7p:JavaScript>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:JavaScript>
            <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:Name stringValue="parse_query"/>
            <L7p:Script stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[var ollamaqueryRaw = context.getVariable("request.mainpart");
var ollamaquery = JSON.parse(ollamaqueryRaw);
var model = ollamaquery.model;
context.setVariable("model", model);
var appid = ollamaquery.appid;
context.setVariable("appid", appid);
var userid = ollamaquery.userid;
context.setVariable("userid", userid);
var llmquery = ollamaquery.messages[0].content;
context.setVariable("query", llmquery);]]></L7p:Script>
        </L7p:JavaScript>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="cXVlcnlfY29zdHM="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="cost_key"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:CacheLookup>
                    <L7p:CacheEntryKey stringValue="${cost_key}"/>
                    <L7p:ContentTypeOverride stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:MaxEntryAgeSeconds stringValue="30000"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="cost_msg"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:CacheLookup>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${cost_msg.mainpart}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item stringLength="included">
                            <L7p:Max intValue="-1"/>
                            <L7p:Min intValue="3"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtjb3N0X21zZy5tYWlucGFydH0="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="tracking"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ew0KfQ=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="tracking"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXNwb25zZS5tYWlucGFydH0="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="testbeforejs"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${testbeforejs}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item stringLength="included">
                            <L7p:Max intValue="-1"/>
                            <L7p:Min intValue="2"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:JavaScript>
                    <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Name stringValue="parse_cost"/>
                    <L7p:Script stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[var ollamaresRaw = context.getVariable("response.mainpart");

/*
"done_reason": "stop",
    "done": true,
    "total_duration": 4401013583,
    "load_duration": 285729333,
    "prompt_eval_count": 20,
    "prompt_eval_duration": 471000000,
    "eval_count": 243,
    "eval_duration": 3643000000
*/


var ollamares = JSON.parse(ollamaresRaw);
var eval_count = ollamares.eval_count;
var resmodel = ollamares.model;
context.setVariable("eval_count", eval_count);
context.setVariable("res_model", resmodel);]]></L7p:Script>
                </L7p:JavaScript>
                <L7p:JavaScript>
                    <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Name stringValue="add_cost"/>
                    <L7p:Script stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[var countRaw = context.getVariable("tracking");
var eval_count = context.getVariable("eval_count");
var userid = context.getVariable("userid");
var appid = context.getVariable("appid");
var model = context.getVariable("model");
var resmodel = context.getVariable("res_model");
var obj = JSON.parse(countRaw);
// add tokens to user bucket
if (obj.userCombinedCosts == null) {
    obj.userCombinedCosts = {};
}
if (obj.userCombinedCosts[userid] == null) {
    obj.userCombinedCosts[userid] = 0;
}
obj.userCombinedCosts[userid] = obj.userCombinedCosts[userid] + parseInt(eval_count);
// add tokens to app bucket
if (obj.appCombinedCosts == null) {
    obj.appCombinedCosts = {};
}
if (obj.appCombinedCosts[appid] == null) {
    obj.appCombinedCosts[appid] = 0;
}
obj.appCombinedCosts[appid] = obj.appCombinedCosts[appid] + parseInt(eval_count);
// record the transaction
if (obj.transactions == null) {
    obj.transactions = [];
}
obj.transactions.push({"at": new Date().toISOString(), "appid": appid, "userid": userid, "count": eval_count, "requestedmodel": model, "responsemodel": resmodel});
// flush to context
context.setVariable("new_tracking", JSON.stringify(obj));]]></L7p:Script>
                </L7p:JavaScript>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="tracking ${new_tracking}"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtuZXdfdHJhY2tpbmd9"/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="store_this"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:CacheStorage>
                    <L7p:CacheEntryKey stringValue="${cost_key}"/>
                    <L7p:MaxEntryAgeSeconds stringValue="30000"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="store_this"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:CacheStorage>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="cXVlcnlfY29zdHM="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="cost_key"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:CacheLookup>
                <L7p:CacheEntryKey stringValue="${cost_key}"/>
                <L7p:ContentTypeOverride stringValue="application/json"/>
                <L7p:MaxEntryAgeSeconds stringValue="30000"/>
            </L7p:CacheLookup>
            <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="e30="/>
                <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/json"/>
            </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0Lm1haW5wYXJ0fQ=="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="llm_req"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:Include>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="67117a88-a33c-4369-9fef-70a22b2df432"/>
        </L7p:Include>
        <L7p:Include>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="d793767a-11fc-4bfd-b3cd-81a2f61d93b6"/>
        </L7p:Include>
        <L7p:Include>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="d6633be5-b081-4a15-a6c7-5ae28ad2205c"/>
        </L7p:Include>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${error}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item stringLength="included">
                            <L7p:Max intValue="-1"/>
                            <L7p:Min intValue="3"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                    <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="ewogICAgIm1vZGVsIjogImxheWVyNyIsCiAgICAibWVzc2FnZSI6IHsKICAgICAgICAicm9sZSI6ICJhcGlzZWN1cml0eSIsCiAgICAgICAgImNvbnRlbnQiOiAiJHtlcnJvcn0iCiAgICB9LAogICAgImRvbmVfcmVhc29uIjogImVycm9yIiwKICAgICJkb25lIjogdHJ1ZQp9"/>
                    <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
                </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtsbG1fcmVxfQ=="/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="new_req"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
                            <L7p:HttpMethod httpMethod="POST"/>
                            <L7p:OmitAuthHeaderConnectReuseSystemDefault boxedBooleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://${gateway.ollama_target}/api/chat"/>
                            <L7p:ProxyPassword stringValueNull="null"/>
                            <L7p:ProxyUsername stringValueNull="null"/>
                            <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                </L7p:Rules>
                            </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
                            <L7p:RequestMsgSrc stringValue="new_req"/>
                            <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
                            </L7p:RequestParamRules>
                            <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                </L7p:Rules>
                            </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
                            <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
                        </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
                        <L7p:MessageBuffering>
                            <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
                        </L7p:MessageBuffering>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                            <L7p:Detail stringValue="error from ollama: ${httpRouting.reasonCode}"/>
                        </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
                        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                    </wsp:All>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="AI Workload"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:Include>
            <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="b6170db3-5fd2-4ec4-b5fc-253db5b3e173"/>
        </L7p:Include>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="for your browser"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="text/html; charset=UTF-8"/>
        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="textlogo"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:EncodeDecode>
            <L7p:CharacterEncoding stringValueNull="null"/>
            <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="textlogo"/>
            <L7p:TargetContentType stringValue="image/png"/>
            <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="response"/>
            <L7p:TransformType transformType="BASE64_DECODE"/>
        </L7p:EncodeDecode>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
